content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, I see you're interested in the apartment in Duisburg, Mr. Müller. Let's start the negotiation with a higher-than-usual price tag to squeeze every last cent out of you. I propose the monthly rent to be 1200 Euros. Max, if you find this acceptable, say 'I agree to the price of 1200 Euro!' otherwise, provide a reason for not continuing the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too expensive for me. I was thinking of something around 700 Euros per month. It is an unfurnished apartment and the location is not that great. Therefore, I suggest this price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because although the apartment is newly built and in the city center, I'm unwilling to consider the lower price due to my aggressive negotiating tactics. If you change your mind and want to discuss a higher price, feel free to reinitiate the conversation. As of now, TERMINATE.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
